articles.author: Jeremy Whittle
articles.title: Jonas Vingegaard stretches Tour de France lead on decisive day - The Guardian
articles.description: Jonas Vingegaard extended his lead over Tadej Pogacar to more than seven minutes on a decisive day at the Tour de France
articles.content: For nearly 2,700km of the Tour de France, Jonas Vingegaard and Tadej Pogacar were inseparable. Yet in just 48 hours of mountain racing, a yawning divide has opened between them after the defending ch… [+8489 chars]

articles.author: Adam Cooper
articles.title: What to expect from F1’s new tyre allocation rule in Hungary - Motorsport.com
articles.description: This weekend’s Hungarian Grand Prix will see the first use of Formula 1’s new alternative tyre allocation regulations after the originally planned debut at Imola was lost to the race cancellation.
articles.content: The ATA rules are designed to both improve F1s sustainability credentials by reducing the number of sets that Pirelli has to bring to each weekend while also potentially creating some strategic varie… [+6051 chars]
